front.title: GOST Cipher Suites for Transport Layer Security (TLS) Protocol Version 1.3

abstract.t: The purpose of this document is to make the Russian cryptographic standards available to the Internet community for their implementation in the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Protocol Version 1.3. This specification defines four new cipher suites and seven new signature schemes based on GOST R 34.12-2015, GOST R 34.11-2012 and GOST R 34.10-2012 algorithms.
